title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Feb 17 2022
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Feb 17 2022
description:
Clay and Buck honor the founding father of conservative talk radio on the one-year anniversary of Rush's passing. Kathryn Limbaugh tells us how she's doing after a difficult year and continuing Rush's legacy. Sean Hannity shares his Rush memories and unforgetable moments. Callers remember Rush and all he meant to them.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
